 2021-01532021-03-17ISED,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActRadiocommunication Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Radiocommunication Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the RADIOCOMMUNICATION REGULATIONS in order to change the current capacity-based fee model for point-to-point systems in the fixed service to a consumption-based fee model with differential pricing for urban, rural, and remote areas.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0040 Publication Date: 2021-03-31
AttachmentsAttachment
